refsect1.para: All functions listed here are thread-agnostic and only a single thread may operate on a given object at any given time. Different threads may access the same object at different times. Multiple independent objects may be used from different threads in parallel.
All functions listed here are thread-safe and may be called in parallel from multiple threads.

The code described here uses getenv3, which is declared to be not multi-thread-safe. This means that the code calling the functions described here must not call setenv3 from a parallel thread. It is recommended to only do calls to setenv() from an early phase of the program when no other threads have been started.
